div.ab:
أخوه
فرج الحاطبي
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
حضرة الشّيخ الأجل أبو مفرّج أدام اللّه سعادته
والّذي أعلمك به أنّي قد سيّرت إليك صحبة علي
بن فلّاح الحلّي ثلثي دقيق وهي قطعتين
فتسلّمهم الجواب الجراب صحبة موصلها
وشريت عشر وربع ويبات الّتي طلبتهم
وشريت لك الكسوة وهي واصلة صحبتي
إن شا اللّه ولنا وأنا خارج يوم الخميس إن شا اللّه تعل
واللّه اللّه وثم لهم اللّه تشحنوا ولا تعوقهم
من كل بد والسّلام والسّلم عليك ورحمة اللّه وبركاته

ʾaḫū hu
faraǧ:uni ăl ḥāṭibiyyu
bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ḥaḍraẗu ăš šayḫi ăl ʾaǧallu ʾabū mufarriǧ:in ʾadāma ăl lāhu saʿādata hu
wa ăllaḏī ʾuʿlimu ka bi hi ʾan nī qad sayyartu ʾilay ka ṣuḥbaẗa ʿaliyyi
bni fallāḥa ăl ḥilliyyi ṯulṯay daqīq:in wa hiya qiṭʿatayni
fa tusallim hum *** ăl ǧawāb ǧirāb ṣuḥbaẗa mūṣili hā
wa šaraytu ʿašra wa rubʿa waybāt:ini ăllatī ṭalabta hum
wa šaraytu la ka ăl kiswaẗa wa hiya wāṣilaẗ:un ṣuḥbat ī
ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu wa la ʾanā nā ḫāriǧ:un yawma ăl ḫamīsi ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu taʿāla
wa ăl lāhu ăl lāhu wa ṯumma la ăl hum lāhu tašḥanū wa lā taʿūq hum
min kulli budd:in wa ăs salāmu ʿalay ka wa raḥmaẗu ăl lāhi wa barakātu hu

[From] his brother
Faraj al-Ḥāṭibī.
In the name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate.
To the most noble Shaykh Abū Mufarrij - may God make his happiness everlasting! -.
... I have dispatched to you ... This is to inform you that I have sent to you, to be accompanied by ʿAlī
ibn Fallāḥ al-Ḥillī, two-thirds of the flour [I owed to you?], and they are [packed in] two containers. ... two thirds of the flour [as you requested? or that I owe your?] and they are in two qiṭʿas.
Please give them [to ... and then issue] a receipt, to be carried [back] by the carrier who delivered them.
I bought ten and a quarter waybas [of flour] as you had demanded.
I also bought you kiswa-cloaks, and they will be brought over by myself,
God willing! We are supposed to leave the town this Thursday, God willing!
O God, O God! load them [as soon as possible] and do not delay in their [shipping]
by all means! Peace be upon you, God's mercy and blessings [be upon you].
